data.text: Yesu kandusa keli kulangulitsa mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu lya Galilaya. Iwanu wengi iwetingane wamtsunguluka mbaka kengila mne mnumbwi na kukala amo. Ne iwanu wose wakala mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu.
Tsakawalangulitsa ipfinu pfingi kwe imifano, na mne ghamalangulitso ghake kawalongela.
“Mtegheletse, Imunu iyohanda tsimbeghu tsakaghenda kumitsa tsimbeghu.
Hang'ali yomitsa, tsimbeghu tsimwenga tsilaghalila mnzila, pfideghe watsa, watsija.
Tsingi tsilaghalila mne ghamabwe ghane lidongo chidogho. Tsimbeghu tsota himahima, kwaapfila lidongo tsachidogho.
Litsua halilawile, liilakatsa imimeya kwaapfila imitsisi ng'aighendese hasi bae.
Tsimbeghu tsingi tsilaghalila mne tsimiwa, tsikula na tsihinyighwa na tsimiwa, apfo ng'atseleke bae.
Lekeni tsimbeghu tsingi tsilaghalila mne lidongo linoghile. Imimeya yota, ikula na yeleka tsimbeghu, ingi makumi madatu, ingi makumi sita ne ingi miya imwe.”
Kuya Yesu kalonga, “Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, yahulike.”
Yesu hayakalile aliyeka, iwanang'ina kumi na weli ne iwanu wangi wamghutsa imbuli ayo ilonga choni.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwemwe mwing'ighwa imbuli ifisighwe ya Undewa we Imulungu. Lekeni awala iwali kunze, wohulika ipfinu kwe imifano
ili,
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi mwemwe ng'ammanyile bae mbuli ino? Lelo mtsomanyatse imbuli yoyose?
Imunu iyohanda kohanda Imbuli ye Imulungu.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mnzila. Hawohulika Imbuli ye Imulungu, Setani kakutsa na kuisola imbuli ihandighwe mghati mwawo.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne ghamabwe. Baho hawohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, woibokela kwa kudeng'elela.
Lekeni kwaapfila wahela imitsitsi, wodudumila chidogho. Ukughaya au ukughanzika kung'alawila kwaajili ye imbuli ye Imulungu, baho woileka.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne tsimiwa. Wohulika imbuli,
lekeni Sang'ano tse isi ino na kubama tsimali na kusulukila ipfinu pfingi, pfakwingila mghati mwawo na kuihinya imbuli ye Imulungu, ng'aikweleka bae.
Lekeni iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo linoghile. Wohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, woitoghola na wakweleka, wangi selasini, wangi sitini, na wangi miya imwe.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Apfi kuna imunu iyoghala chitasa mng'anda na kuchighubika ne ichiha au kuchika kumpfungu mwe lusatsi? Apfi ng'ochika hanu ha kwikila chitasa, bae?
Kwaapfila ichinu chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakoneka, ne ichinu chochose ichighubikighwe chitsoghubulighwa.
Yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, yahulike.”
Pfipfila kawalongela, “Mtegheletse ghoya chamuhulika! Ghamalaghitso ghamuwahighila iwanu wangi, Imulungu katsowahighila ghamalaghitso ghagho, kuya mtsakongetsighwa.
Kwaapfila imunu yane ichinu katsakongetsighwa ne imunu yalihela ichinu, katsobokighwa hata ichinu chidodo chayenacho.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Undewa we Imulungu weghala pfino. Imunu kopwililisa tsimbeghu kumghunda.
Nechilo kowasa, nemisi kameso. Tsimbeghu tsakota na kukula, naye ng'omanya bae ichitendeka.
Lidongo lyenyegho lyotenda imimeya ikule na kweleka, tanu yotula, yolapfa imbelewele, kuya yakweleka.
Uhemba hauwela, imunu ayo kosenga kwa sengo yake, kwaapfila ichipindi cha kupfuna chipfika.”
Yesu kalonga keli, “Apfi Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne ichinu chachi? Apfi tutsolonga kwe imbuli yachi?
Weghala ne imbeghu ya haladali, imbeghu ndodo kubita tsimbeghu tsose itsihandighwa mne isi.
Lekeni ing'ahandighwa, yokula na yakuwa mmeya mkulu kubita imimeya yose mne mghunda, nayo yakuwa na ghamaputila makulu ng'ani mbaka wapfideghe wodaha kutsenga ipfibali mne ghamaputila ghake.”
Yesu kawapetela iwanu imbuli yake kwa mbuli nyingi itsighalile na tsino, kawalongela ka pfawadahile kuhulika.
Ng'alongile nawo bae ichinu chochose bila ye imbuli. Lekeni hawakalile ne iwanang'ina wake waliyeka, kawalongela chila ichinu.
Litsuwa alyo nemihe, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Tuloke kumwambu kwa tsimbu.”
Tsawawaleka iwanu, iwanang'ina wengila mne mnumbwi mwakalile Yesu, wamsola woka naye. Pfipfila tsakukala na minumbwi ingi.
Inyahemu ilawila na ghamawimbi ghautowa mnumbwi mbaka ghwandusa kumema ghamatsi.
Yesu tsakakala kuchughu kwa mnumbwi kawasila ghumto. Iwanang'ina wake wamlamsa, wamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, apfi ng'aukona usungu bae, ka twetwe twotsama?”
Yesu kalamka, kalikembela libeho na kaghalongela ghamawimbi, “Nyamala!”, kuya libeho linyamala na kukala kutindiwala.
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Ule mpfuka? Pfii, mng'ali ng'amtoghola bae?”
Nawo wapfuka ghendo, weghutsa, “Ayu munu wachi, libeho na ghamawimbi ghose ghomhulikitsa?”
